name:
Project X Zone 2 Update
Ver. 1.2
description: This is an update for the Project X Zone 2 game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of Project X Zone 2.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
